user_prompt:
List the ingredients that you see on the image and then recommend a very simple recipe that can be made using only these ingredients. When you list the ingredients, please include how many of them needed for the recipe. If there is no food on the image, reply: 'NoFoodException'. Please try to be very concise.

The output format
Ingredients:
Recipe Name:
Estimated cooking time:
Recipe for <number of people> people
Recipe:
